name: correlation_id
description: Common ID for all records created by a specific pipeline run

name: record_status
description: Indicates active, valid or error status of a record

name: report_type
description: Name of summary report type e.g. SUMMARY

name: category
description: Indicates data category e.g. Fresh, Frozen, Non-NFSI

name: pkrd_quantity_sum
description: Sum of quantity of product dispatched

name: pkrd_value_tp_sum
description: Sum of transfer pricing generated value of product dispatched

name: nfsi_quantity_sum
description: Sum of quantity of product received

name: nfsi_value_sum
description: Sum of value of product received

name: quantity_variance_sum
description: Sum of variance between quantity dispatched and received

name: value_variance_sum
description: Sum of variance between transfer pricing value dispatched and received

name: git_quantity_sum
description: Sum of goods in transit quantity

name: git_value_sum
description: Sum of goods in transit value

name: pct_of_sales
description: Percentage of sales represented by variance

name: ptd_ex_git
description: Profits to date excluding goods in transit

name: pct_of_sales_ex_git
description: Percentage of sales represented by variance excluding goods in transit
